newsitem.title: USA: Leslie's Poolmart Q2 sales rise.
newsitem.headline: Leslie's Poolmart Q2 sales rise.

text.p: Leslie's Poolmart Inc on Friday reported second quarter sales of $98.0 million, up 10.4 percent from $88.8 million for the same quarter in 1996.

Leslie's said in a news release that its earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) for the quarter, excluding merger costs, were $18.4 million, compared to $18.5 million for the year-ago period.
For the first six months of 1997, Leslie's sales were up 14.0 percent to $121.9 million, from $106.9 million for the same period a year ago.
Leslie's EBITDA for the recent six-month period was $10.1 million, compared to $11.0 million for the year-ago period.
Leslie's is a specialty retailer of swimming pool supplies and related products.
